column1: Appendix table 15. Estimates and standard errors for figure 2: Percent of persons age 12 or older who were victims of violent crime and violent crime excluding simple assault, 1993–2022
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Crime Victimization Survey, 1993–2022
Authors: Alexandra Thompson and Susannah N. Tapp, PhD, BJS Statisticians
Appendix table 15. Estimates and standard errors for figure 2: Percent of persons age 12 or older who were victims of violent crime and violent crime excluding simple assault, 1993–2022

--Estimates for 2006 should not be compared to other years. See Criminal Victimization, 2007 (NCJ 224390, BJS, December 2008) for information on changes to the 2006 National Crime Victimization Survey.
